Class LindbergFlexBeanFactory

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
flex.messaging.FlexConfigurable, flex.messaging.FlexFactory
public class LindbergFlexBeanFactory
extends Object
implements flex.messaging.FlexFactory

Lindberg flex factory implementation to integrate the flex layer with a business layer that uses lindbergframework IOC.

Author:
Victor Lindberg
